DOC.brief_summary: As many one-third female healthcare provider use intrauterine contraception ( IUC ) , 8 percent US woman overall . This begs question : Might physician self-disclosure personal IUC use increase IUC use among patient ? However , positive negative impact physician self disclosure IUC uptake patient satisfaction generally unknown . The purpose study evaluate physician self-disclosure personal IUC use increase patient use IUC impact patient ' satisfaction clinical encounter .
DOC.detailed_description: We perform prospective randomize block design pilot trail usual contraceptive counsel versus usual counseling plus physician self-disclosure personal intrauterine contraceptive use .
DOC.criteria: reproductive age currently sexually active schedule benign gynecology visit , annual exam , family plan visit seek pregnancy within 1 year currently use IUC prior sterilization procedure currently pregnant
